main event: Two round objects were observed on radar and through binoculars, appearing yellowish-red in color, moving back and forth before disappearing.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving in a zigzag pattern.
The objects were viewed through binoculars, providing a closer look at their appearance.
The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes.
The report includes input from a Colonel who observed a very bright, luminous object hovering in the east and maneuvering before disappearing.
The report mentions that the Chicago and Detroit air traffic centers were checked for any aircraft in the area, but no reports were found.
